Name: convert_rlum2xlum
Title: Convert RLum-class objects to the XLUM format
Description: Converts  Luminescence::RLum  objects to xlum format
Author: Sebastian Kreutzer, Geography & Earth Sciences, Aberystwyth University (United Kingdom)
Citation: Kreutzer, S., 2022. convert_rlum2xlum(): Convert RLum-class objects to the XLUM format. Function version 0.1.0. In: Kreutzer, S., 2022. xlum: Read, Write, and Convert xlum Data. R package version 0.1.0.9000-45.

Name: read_xlum
Title: Import xlum files
Description: Imports xlum files using  xml2::read_xml . Comes with a few convenience features, such as the transformation of string lists to numeric vectors where meaningful.
Author: Sebastian Kreutzer, Geography & Earth Sciences, Aberystwyth University (United Kingdom)
Citation: Kreutzer, S., 2022. read_xlum(): Import xlum files. Function version 0.1.0. In: Kreutzer, S., 2022. xlum: Read, Write, and Convert xlum Data. R package version 0.1.0.9000-45.

Name: validate_xlum
Title: Validate xlum format against an XSD reference schema
Description: A a convenience wrapper around  xml2::xml_validate  against the reference format description shipped with  xlum-package
Author: Sebastian Kreutzer, Geography & Earth Sciences, Aberystwyth University
Citation: Kreutzer, S., 2022. validate_xlum(): Validate xlum format against an XSD reference schema. In: Kreutzer, S., 2022. xlum: Read, Write, and Convert xlum Data. R package version 0.1.0.9000-45.

Name: write_xlum
Title: Write xlum files
Author: Sebastian Kreutzer, Geography & Earth Sciences, Aberystwyth University (united Kingdom)
Citation: Kreutzer, S., 2022. write_xlum(): Write xlum files. Function version 0.1.0. In: Kreutzer, S., 2022. xlum: Read, Write, and Convert xlum Data. R package version 0.1.0.9000-45.
